name: GREENFIELD TOWNSHIP MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY, Appellee, v. GORDON L. DELOZIER, INC., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Greenfield Township Municipal Authority v. Gordon L. Delozier, Inc.

judges: Before ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
parties: GREENFIELD TOWNSHIP MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY, Appellee, v. GORDON L. DELOZIER, INC., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
And NOW this 20th day of August, 2002, the appeal is DISMISSED as having been improvidently granted.
Justice NIGRO dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kenneth Weller Lee, for Gordon L. DeLozier, Inc.
Ralph Michael Monico, Greenfield Township Municipal Authority.
casebody.head_matter:
803 A.2d 1204
GREENFIELD TOWNSHIP MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY, Appellee, v. GORDON L. DELOZIER, INC., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted June 13, 2002.
Decided Aug. 20, 2002.
Kenneth Weller Lee, for Gordon L. DeLozier, Inc.
Ralph Michael Monico, Greenfield Township Municipal Authority.
Before ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
